about_the_game:
Gameplay

This is a game that combines visual novel elements with 2D maze exploration and interactive features. The player will collect items and encounter chasing battles along the way in the maze. Beware, if caught by the monsters, the player will face mandatory events! Please proceed with caution.

Story

The protagonist Fiona awakens from a deep slumber, having lost her memory of this world. She finds herself in the magical-centric Empire of Millier, surrounded by a perilous magical forest. Within this forest lies a legendary city called Pretannim, rumored to be found only by those deemed worthy by the forest after overcoming its numerous challenges. It is said that within this city lies a magical book capable of granting any wish. In order to retrieve her lost memories, Fiona embarks on an exciting (and possibly blushing?!) journey.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains depictions of sexual assault, non-consensual intercourse, rape, and BDSM content.

name: 幻想中世妓 : Gaudens

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Requires 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R9 280 or NVIDIA GTX 960 or equivalent (or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 790 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct compatible sound card for audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit or Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Requires 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or Intel Core i7 7700 or equivalent (or better)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 790 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct compatible sound card for audio

short_description: Beautiful princesses and valiant knights, or perhaps valiant and beautiful princess's knight? Amidst a chaotic society and open customs, immerse yourself in the open yet chaotic world of 'Gaudens', fulfilling all your fantasies of the medieval era!
